verses.verse: Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> opposite Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Command <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that they give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their possession, <S%H272><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in; and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the cities. <S%H5892><s%>

"And the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be theirs <S%H1992><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in; and their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> shall be for their cattle <S%H929><s%> and for their herds <S%H7399><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> their beasts. <S%H9130><s%>

"And the pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [shall extend] from the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> outward <S%H2351><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> around. <S%H5439><s%>

"You shall also measure <S%H4058><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on the east <S%H9506><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> with the city <S%H5892><s%> in the center. <S%H8432><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> theirs <S%H1992><s%> as pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> for the cities. <S%H5892><s%>

"And the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [shall be] the six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> to; and in addition <S%H5921><s%> to them you shall give <S%H5414><s%> forty-two cities. <S%H5892><s%>

"All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [shall be] forty-eight cities, <S%H5892><s%> together with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>

"As for the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> from the possession <S%H272><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you shall take <S%H7235><s%> more <S%H7235><s%> from the larger <S%H7227><s%> and you shall take <S%H4591><s%> less <S%H4591><s%> from the smaller; <S%H4592><s%> each <S%H376><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of his cities <S%H5892><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in proportion <S%H6310><s%> to his possession <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he inherits. <S%H5157><s%>"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'When <S%H3588><s%> you cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>

then you shall select <S%H7136><s%> for yourselves cities <S%H5892><s%> to be your cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> who has killed <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unintentionally <S%H7684><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

'And the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be to you as a refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger, <S%H1350><s%> so that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> may not die <S%H4191><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stands <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> for trial. <S%H4941><s%>
'And the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are to give <S%H5414><s%> shall be your six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

'You shall give <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> across <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> they are to be cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge. <S%H4733><s%>

'These <S%H428><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be for refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the alien <S%H1616><s%> and for the sojourner <S%H8453><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; that anyone <S%H3605><s%> who kills <S%H5221><s%> a person <S%H5315><s%> unintentionally <S%H7684><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

'But if <S%H518><s%> he struck <S%H5221><s%> him down <S%H5221><s%> with an iron <S%H1270><s%> object, <S%H3627><s%> so that he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer; <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

'And if <S%H518><s%> he struck <S%H5221><s%> him down <S%H5221><s%> with a stone <S%H68><s%> in the hand, <S%H3027><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> he may die, <S%H4191><s%> and [as a result] he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer; <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

'Or <S%H176><s%> if he struck <S%H5221><s%> him with a wooden <S%H6086><s%> object <S%H3627><s%> in the hand, <S%H3027><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> he may die, <S%H4191><s%> and [as a result] he died, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer; <S%H7523><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

'The blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger <S%H1350><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> shall put <S%H4191><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> to death; <S%H4191><s%> he shall put <S%H4191><s%> him to death <S%H4191><s%> when he meets <S%H6293><s%> him.

'And if <S%H518><s%> he pushed <S%H1920><s%> him of hatred, <S%H8135><s%> or <S%H176><s%> threw <S%H7993><s%> something at him lying <S%H6660><s%> in wait <S%H6660><s%> and [as a result] he died, <S%H4191><s%>

or <S%H176><s%> if he struck <S%H5221><s%> him down <S%H5221><s%> with his hand <S%H3027><s%> in enmity, <S%H342><s%> and [as a result] he died, <S%H4191><s%> the one who struck <S%H5221><s%> him shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death, <S%H4191><s%> he is a murderer; <S%H7523><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger <S%H1350><s%> shall put <S%H4191><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> to death <S%H4191><s%> when he meets <S%H6293><s%> him.

'But if <S%H518><s%> he pushed <S%H1920><s%> him suddenly <S%H6621><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> enmity, <S%H342><s%> or <S%H176><s%> threw <S%H7993><s%> something <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3627><s%> at him without <S%H3808><s%> lying <S%H6660><s%> in wait, <S%H6660><s%>

or <S%H176><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> deadly <S%H834><s%> <S%H4191><s%> object of stone, <S%H68><s%> and without <S%H3808><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> it dropped <S%H5307><s%> on him so that he died, <S%H4191><s%> while he was not his enemy <S%H340><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> seeking <S%H1245><s%> his injury, <S%H9567><s%>

then the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the slayer <S%H5221><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger <S%H1350><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> ordinances. <S%H4941><s%>

'And the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger, <S%H1350><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall restore <S%H7725><s%> him to his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> he fled; <S%H5127><s%> and he shall live <S%H3427><s%> in it until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was anointed <S%H4886><s%> with the holy <S%H6944><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>

'But if <S%H518><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> shall at any <S%H3318><s%> time <S%H3318><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> beyond <S%H3318><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> he may flee, <S%H5127><s%>

and the blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger <S%H1350><s%> finds <S%H4672><s%> him outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> avenger <S%H1350><s%> kills <S%H7523><s%> the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> he shall not be guilty of blood <S%H1818><s%>

because <S%H3588><s%> he should have remained <S%H3427><s%> in his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest. <S%H3548><s%> But after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession. <S%H272><s%>

'And these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> shall be for a statutory <S%H2708><s%> ordinance <S%H4941><s%> to you throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

'If anyone <S%H3605><s%> kills <S%H5221><s%> a person, <S%H5315><s%> the murderer <S%H7523><s%> shall be put <S%H7523><s%> to death <S%H7523><s%> at the evidence <S%H6310><s%> of witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> but no <S%H3808><s%> person <S%H5315><s%> shall be put <S%H4191><s%> to death <S%H4191><s%> on the testimony <S%H6030><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> witness. <S%H5707><s%>

'Moreover, you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> ransom <S%H3724><s%> for the life <S%H5315><s%> of a murderer <S%H7523><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is guilty <S%H7563><s%> of death, <S%H4191><s%> but he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

'And you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> ransom <S%H3724><s%> for him who has fled <S%H5127><s%> to his city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> that he may return <S%H7725><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

'So you shall not pollute <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you are; for blood <S%H1818><s%> pollutes <S%H2610><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> expiation <S%H3722><s%> can be made <S%H3722><s%> for the land <S%H776><s%> for the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is shed <S%H8210><s%> on it, except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of him who shed <S%H8210><s%> it.

'And you shall not defile <S%H2930><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you live, <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I dwell; <S%H7931><s%> for I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> am dwelling <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>' "
